message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $180.
Hello Alice, thank you for the offer. I appreciate the product, but I was hoping to stay within my budget. Could we perhaps meet somewhere closer to $100?
I understand you're looking to stay within your budget, Bob, but I've got some costs associated with the product that I need to cover. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm counteroffering at $140.
Thank you for your counteroffer, Alice. I appreciate your flexibility. Considering my budget, could we possibly agree on $120?
I appreciate your persistence, Bob! I'm willing to make one more concession. I can do $145, but that's as low as I'm willing to go. It's a great deal, and I think you'll really love the product.
